data.comment: The match is underway in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match at Neo Quimica Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Romulo Otero, who is down injured.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Corinthians throw-in in Flamengo's half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Attention is being given to Flamengo’s Everton Ribeiro and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Corinthians.
Everton Ribeiro has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 7, Romulo Otero is back on the pitch.
Everton Ribeiro for Flamengo drives towards goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corinthians's Everaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Flamengo at Neo Quimica Arena.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Corinthians.
Free kick Flamengo.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians are pushing forward but Romulo Otero's finish is wide of the goal.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Flamengo's Everton Ribeiro is whistled for offside at Neo Quimica Arena.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Sao Paulo Flamengo attack through Everton Ribeiro. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians.
In the minute 27, Corinthians needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Corinthians drive upfield and Fagner gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Flamengo defender.
Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
In the minute 29, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Sao Paulo, Romulo Otero of Corinthians is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 31, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Everaldo of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 32, Goal! Flamengo take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Everton Ribeiro.
That's a fine assist from Filipe Luis.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Flamengo a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Flamengo at Neo Quimica Arena.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 38, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corinthians's Lucas Piton Crivellaro breaks free at Neo Quimica Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 39, Flamengo have a goal kick.
Flamengo make their first substitution with Gabriel Noga replacing Gustavo Henrique.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 41, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Joao Vitor Xavier de Almeida is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Natan (Flamengo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 43, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Guilherme Camacho (Corinthians) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Corinthians.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Corinthians.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 45, Corinthians's Joao Vitor Xavier de Almeida attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Guilherme Camacho (Corinthians) has received a first yellow card.
At Neo Quimica Arena, Bruno Henrique for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
The second-half is underway in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Corinthians's area.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Corinthians.
Romulo Otero (Corinthians) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In the minute 49, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Vitinho puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Great play from Everton Ribeiro to set up the goal.
In the minute 54, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Flamengo throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Luan is on a sub for Mauro Boselli for Corinthians.
In the minute 55, Gustavo Mantuan is replacing Romulo Otero for the home team.
The home team have replaced Mateus Vital with Juan Cazares. This is the third substitution made today by Vagner Mancini.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Goal! Flamengo increase their lead to 0-3 through a well-placed header from Natan.
In the minute 58, Everton Ribeiro with an assist there.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick Corinthians.
In the minute 63, Gil for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick Corinthians.
At Neo Quimica Arena, Thiago Maia has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 64, Gil (Corinthians) heads in to reduce the deficit to 1-3.
Luan instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Gil (Corinthians) strikes at Neo Quimica Arena but his header is cleared.
Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
In the minute 69, Corinthians drive into the zone and Juan Cazares is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Corinthians pushes forward through Luan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 70, Corinthians are coming forward and Gil gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Neo Quimica Arena.
Throw-in for Corinthians in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 71, The home team replace Everaldo with Gustavo Silva.
In the minute 72, Goal! Flamengo extend their lead to 1-4 through Bruno Henrique.
Mauricio Isla with an assist there.
Corinthians's Gustavo Mantuan is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 74, In Sao Paulo, Marllon (Corinthians) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Domenec Torrent Font (Flamengo) is making a second substitution, with Willian Arao replacing Thiago Maia.
In the minute 74, Diego is replacing Vitinho for the away team.
Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Corinthians throw-in in Flamengo's half.
Gabriel is replacing Guilherme Camacho for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corinthians push forward at Neo Quimica Arena and Luan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Flamengo defence.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Flamengo.
In the minute 77, Filipe Luis (Flamengo) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
In the minute 78, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 81, Gustavo Mantuan (Corinthians) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
Domenec Torrent Font is making the team's fourth substitution at Neo Quimica Arena with Ramon replacing Everton Ribeiro.
In the minute 82, Domenec Torrent Font is making the team's fifth substitution at Neo Quimica Arena with Lincoln replacing Pedro.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 85, Flamengo have a goal kick.
It's now 1-5 in Sao Paulo as Diego scores for Flamengo.
Great play from Lincoln to set up the goal.
In the minute 89, Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Flamengo in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
The match is over. Final score 1-5.
Gerson (Flamengo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Luan (Corinthians) has received a yellow card from Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
